message: This is a high-quality product, worth $120. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. It's a great deal! You won't find a better price anywhere else. I'm confident you'll love it.
I'll take it!

This product has been thoroughly inspected and certified by a third-party expert. It's a rare find, and I'm confident you'll be impressed with its unique features. Many customers have purchased similar products from me before and been extremely satisfied.
I'm not sure if this product is high-quality or low-quality. I'll pass for now.

I've had a lot of repeat business from satisfied customers, and I'm proud to offer a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you're not completely happy with this product, I'll give you a full refund. It's a risk-free purchase. Would you like to take advantage of this amazing deal?
I'm not convinced by your guarantee. I'll pass this time.

I'm offering a special promotion for this product. If you buy it now, I'll throw in a complementary accessory that's worth $20. This is a one-time offer, and I'm only making it available to you because I think you'll really appreciate the value. It's a $120 product for $100, plus a $20 bonus. It's a deal you won't want to pass up.
I'll take the deal! The accessory is a nice bonus.

I've had a lot of repeat customers who come back to buy from me again and again. They know they can trust my products. I'm willing to offer you the same level of trust. This product is a high-quality item, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to let you try it out for a week, and if you're not completely satisfied, I'll give you a full refund. No questions asked.
I'll take the product, and I appreciate the trial period and refund guarantee.

I've been in business for a long time, and I've built a reputation for honesty and integrity. I'm willing to put my reputation on the line with this product. I'm offering you a 100% satisfaction guarantee, and I'm also including a certificate of authenticity that verifies the product's quality. This is a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a high-quality product at a discounted price.
I'll take the product, and I appreciate the added assurance of the certificate of authenticity.

This product has been extensively tested and meets all industry standards. I've had several customers who have purchased similar products and been completely satisfied with their performance. It's a great value for the price, and I'm confident you'll be happy with it.
I'm not sure if this product is different from the previous ones. I'll pass this time.

I've got a customer who's looking to buy this product, but they're only interested if someone else has already taken it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100, and I'll even throw in a personalized thank-you note from me. It's a unique opportunity to own a high-quality product and get a personal touch.
I'm not convinced by the personalized thank-you note. I'll pass this time.

I've received a special allocation of high-quality products from a trusted supplier, and I'm offering them to my most valued customers first. This product is one of the best I've ever received, and I'm confident you'll be thrilled with its performance. It's a rare opportunity to own a top-of-the-line product at a discounted price.
I'll take the product! I'm excited to get my hands on a high-quality item.

I've been in the business long enough to know what makes a product stand out, and this one has it all. I'm willing to let you try it out for a day before you commit to buying it, so you can see for yourself how exceptional it is. If you're not blown away, I'll give you a full refund. No questions asked.
I'll take the product, and I appreciate the trial period and refund guarantee.

I'm willing to make a bold statement: this product is the best I've ever sold. I'm not just saying that to sell it to you, I'm saying it because it's true. I've had experts review it, and they've all agreed that it's top-notch. I'm offering it to you for $100, which is a steal considering its value. Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity.
I'll take the product! I trust your assessment of its quality.

I've had a lot of positive feedback from customers who've purchased similar products to this one. They've all been very happy with their purchases, and I'm confident you will be too. This product is a great value for the price, and I'm offering it to you at a special discount. It's a chance to get a good deal on a product that's been well-received by others.
I'll take the product! I appreciate the positive feedback from other customers.

I'm offering you a chance to be one of the first to experience our new premium service package, which includes this high-quality product, plus a complimentary upgrade to our premium support team. This is a $50 value, absolutely free. You'll get priority access to our experts, and you'll be able to get the most out of your purchase. It's a limited-time offer, and I think you'll really appreciate the extra benefits.
I'm not convinced by the premium service package. I'll pass this time.

I'm offering a 'lottery ticket' with this purchase. If you buy this product, you'll be entered into a drawing to win a free, high-quality product of your choice from our catalog. It's a chance to win big, and the product you're looking at is still a great value at $100. Why not take a chance and see if you can win something even better?
I'll take the product! The chance to win a free product is a nice bonus.

I'm willing to offer you a 'price match guarantee'. If you buy this product and find a similar product from a competitor at a lower price, I'll match that price and give you a $20 gift card on top. It's a way for me to show you that I'm confident in the value of this product, and I'm willing to put my money where my mouth is.
I'm not interested in the price match guarantee. I'll pass this time.

I'm willing to make a personal recommendation to you. I've sold many products to customers with your profile and interests, and this one has been a consistent favorite. I've also spoken to the manufacturer, and they're offering a special promotion for this product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a high-quality product at a discounted price. I'm confident you'll love it.
I'll take the product! I appreciate your personal recommendation and the special promotion.

I've got a limited quantity of this product left in stock, and I'm willing to let it go for $100. I'm also including a personalized thank-you note and a small gift that complements the product perfectly. It's a unique opportunity to own a high-quality item and get a special touch that you won't find anywhere else.
I'll take the product! I appreciate the personalized touch and the small gift.

This product has been carefully handpicked from a selection of similar items. I've received great feedback from customers who've purchased similar products, and I'm confident you'll be happy with this one. It's a great value for the price, and I'm offering it to you at a special discount. I think you'll find it's a great addition to your collection.
I'll take the product! I appreciate the careful selection and the special discount.

I'm willing to offer you a 'best offer' deal. I'll give you a price of $90 for this high-quality product. It's the lowest price I've ever offered on this item, and I'm only making it available to you because I think you'll really appreciate its value. It's a chance to get a great deal on a top-notch product.
I'm not convinced by the 'best offer' deal. I'll pass this time.

This product is a 'clearance' item, and I'm only offering it to you because I want to make some space in my inventory. It's still a good product, and I'm selling it to you for $100. I'm not making any promises about its quality, but I think it's worth a shot. If you're looking for a low-cost option, this might be the way to go.
I'm not interested in a clearance item with no guarantees. I'll pass this time.
